name: 芮妮·塔吉玛-佩纳
awards: 1989年 第61届奥斯卡金像奖 最佳纪录长片 (提名) 谁杀了陈果仁
name_full: 芮妮·塔吉玛-佩纳 Renee Tajima-Peña

last_movies.title: My America OR Honk if you love buddha

introduction: Professor Renee Tajima-Pena is an Academy Award-nominated filmmaker whose work focuses on Asian American and immigrant communities, race, gender and social justice. Her directing credits include the documentaries, Calavera Highway, Skate Manzanar, Labor Women, My America...or Honk if You Love Buddha and Who Killed Vincent Chin? Her films have premiered at the Cannes, Sundance and Toronto film festivals, and she has received the Peabody Award, Dupont-Columbia Award, Alpert Award in the Arts, USA Broad Fellowship and a Guggenheim Fellowship.
